title: [For rent by owner] 4bd 2bth unit in queer & POC focused household
posting_body: Looking for a queer & POC focused household?
Wishing for a responsive and personable owner?
Look no further!
First floor apartment in a 2 family house with 4bedrooms & 2 baths available September 1st, 1min walk from JFK/U Mass, 10min walk from Carson Beach!
The house:
Newly renovated and in mint condition, with central air/heat as well as in unit free washer & dryer.
Brand new& updated appliances- fridge with automated ice-maker & water dispenser, dishwasher, range& stove.
The rooms:
2 bedrooms on the first floor: one comes with street facing bay windows, the second bedroom on the first floor is slightly smaller, and can be a great candidate for a game room, or in-home office.
2 bedrooms on the basement level: both rooms spacious, one comes with a massive walk-in closet.
Each floor comes with its own bathroom, kitchen on the first floor.
Details noted in floor plans attached.
Other amenities & perks:
Free off-street tandem parking for 1 vehicle, coordination with upstairs neighbors needed
Storage shed for all things outdoors- bbq grills, beach chairs, etc
Ground bike rack for up to 3 bikes
On site compost bin
Small vegetable garden in the back, this season we are currently growing green onions, cilantro, cucumbers, lettuces, mint, and some herbs!
Fees & logistics:
Asking rent is $3,800/month + utilities.
No brokers fee, no application fee, no last month rent.
Only asking first month + security deposit, which is worth 1 month rent.
Lease term will be September 1st 2022 - September 1st, 2023, with option to renew.
If all goes well, security deposit will be returned at the end of your lease term.
Section 8 accepted, pending on credit check & references.
In-person showing available starting Monday August 1st, please wear a mask when you're in the unit.
You will not be allowed inside if you refuse to wear a mask while touring.
Come live in a queer house and go to the beach with us! :D
